Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.phase.action

Class ActionPhase

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.phase.action.ActionPhase
public class ActionPhase extends Object
Manages the game's Action Phase in normal and expert Variants.

      public ActionPhase(Game game)
      Constructor

  • Method Details

    • getCharacterCards

      public Map<Characters,CharacterCard> getCharacterCards()
      Get character cards
      Returns:
      map of character card and for each the characterization

    • startPhase

      public void startPhase(Player player)
      Starts a new Action phase. Since, during a play, the action phase needs to keep memory of what happens, this method is needed to reset the phase's state every time a player starts his phase in the round
      Parameters:
      player - the player who wants to start his action phase

    • request

      public void request(TeacherColor teacherColor, Optional<StudentsManager> from, Optional<StudentsManager> to) throws IllegalStateException
      Manages the call to the movement of Students between places
      Parameters:
      teacherColor - is the color of the student to move
      from - is the place from which the student is moved
      to - is the place where the student is moved to
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - is thrown when it's not the right moment to move students

    • request

      public void request(Player player, TeacherColor studentA, TeacherColor studentB, String place) throws IllegalStateException
      It's a special student movement request needed by those cards who bidirectionally shift students between places. Since those cards move students between three well-defined places (player's school entrance, p.'s s. room and the card), at every call, thanks the context, is known if it's legal and what places are the ones to move students in and out.
      Parameters:
      player - the player who makes the request
      studentA - the color of the student from the player's entrance
      studentB - the color of the student from the player's room or from the card
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - is thrown when it's not the right moment nor the right game mode to use this kind of student movement

    • request

      public void request(Player player, int motherNatureHops) throws IllegalStateException
      Manages the call to move mother nature
      Parameters:
      player - the player who makes the request to move mother Nature
      motherNatureHops - the number of hops that the player wants her to make
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - is thrown when it's not the right moment to move mother nature

    • request

      public void request(Player player, String id) throws IllegalStateException, NoSuchElementException
      Manages the request to calc the influence or the request of a cloud according to the context
      Parameters:
      player - the player who makes the request
      id - the id of the cloud, or "MotherNature" to calc the influence
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - is thrown when it's not the right moment to calc the influence nor to choose a cloud
      NoSuchElementException

    • request

      public void request() throws IllegalStateException
      Called to merge islands
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - is thrown when it's not the right moment to merge the islands

    • activateCard

      public void activateCard(Characters characters, Player player) throws NoSuchElementException, IllegalStateException, InvalidParameterException
      Method which activates the wanted character card between the enabled ones
      Parameters:
      characters - the character represented by the character card
      player - the player who makes the request
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - thrown when the requested card is not available for this game
      IllegalStateException - thrown when the actual context is not the right one to activate the card
      InvalidParameterException - thrown when the player has not enough money to pay the card activation fee

    • activateCard

      public void activateCard(Characters characters, Player player, TeacherColor color) throws NoSuchElementException, IllegalStateException, InvalidParameterException
      Method which activates the wanted character card between the enabled ones Activator which passes the needed teacher color for the correct functioning of the card
      Parameters:
      characters - the character represented by the character card
      player - the player who makes the request
      color - the needed teacher color
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - thrown when the requested card is not available for this game
      IllegalStateException - thrown when the actual context is not the right one to activate the card
      InvalidParameterException - thrown when the player has not enough money to pay the card activation fee

    • activateCard

      public void activateCard(Characters characters, Player player, Island island) throws NoSuchElementException, IllegalStateException, InvalidParameterException
      Method which activates the wanted character card between the enabled cards Activator which passes the needed island for the correct functioning of the card
      Parameters:
      characters - the character represented by the character card
      player - the player who makes the request
      island - the needed island
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - thrown when the requested card is not available for this game
      IllegalStateException - thrown when the actual context is not the right one to activate the card
      InvalidParameterException - thrown when the player has not enough money to pay the card activation fee

    • autoRun

      public void autoRun(Player player)
      Toned down action phase used when players disconnect half way throw their action phase. After all playing players have finished their turn, this is called to populate the entrance of the disconnected player back to the max number if needed using one of the remaining clouds.
      Parameters:
      player -

      Returns:
